data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Suðuroyar who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Suðuroyar an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, the the state of Suðuroyar will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,551 believers in Suðuroyar to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Porkeri
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Porkeri, Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,551 believers in Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Suðuroyar, Faroe Islands has a population of 4,700.

We estimate Suðuroyar has 1,551 people who might know Jesus, 2,722 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 427 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,551 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
